job.title: Data Scientist - Operations Research
job.industry: Environmental Services,Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: Mackin is looking for an Operations Research Scientist to work within a larger Analytics & Technology-focused group to deliver innovative insights and solutions for our partners. The ideal candidate has a scientific mindset; has expertise in operations research methods and models; applies a pragmatic approach to building solutions; and enjoys collaborating within a dynamic, global team. Responsibilities Apply your expertise in Operations Research, Data Science, and Data Mining to lead analytics projects to inform business operations in programs such as Transportation, Real Estate and Culinary Build models related to shuttle planning, inventory control systems, capacity planning, and location analytics Define, optimize and set the constraints for one or more business metrics Minimum Qualifications Degree in a quantitative field (e.g., Operations Research, Computer Science, Quantitative Finance) or equivalent experience Experience in communicating model results to leadership and cross-functional team members Familiarity with classical operations research problems, such as network optimization, facility location, routing, scheduling Familiarity with algorithms and optimization using solvers such as CPLEX/Gurobi/Xpress or related tools Strong foundation in statistics, probability, & algorithms (e.g., hypothesis testing, regression, stochastic modeling, Markov Chains) Proficient in SQL, including some experience with distributed data platforms such as Spark, Presto, Hive At least 4 years of relevant experience (academic experience also considered) Preferred Qualifications Advanced degree in a quantitative field with experience in Operations Research
